title: Smart Data Models - Control
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Control is used for supervisory/device control. It represents control outputs that are used to change the state in a process, e.g. close or open breaker, a set point value or a raise lower command.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Control

PowerSystemResource.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The controller outputs used to actually govern a regulating device, e.g. the magnetization of a synchronous machine or capacitor bank breaker actuator. Default: None

controlType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Specifies the type of Control, e.g. BreakerOn/Off, GeneratorVoltageSetPoint, TieLineFlow etc. The ControlType.name shall be unique among all specified types and describe the type. Default: ''

operationInProgress.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates that a client is currently sending control commands that has not completed. Default: False

timeStamp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The last time a control output was sent. Default: ''

unitMultiplier.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The unit multiplier of the controlled quantity. Default: None

unitSymbol.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The unit of measure of the controlled quantity. Default: None
